com.urbancode.ubuild.scripting.jobs
Class JobStatus

java.lang.Object
  com.urbancode.ubuild.scripting.jobs.JobStatus

public class JobStatus
extends java.lang.Object

Scripting class to determine if a job should execute based on the statuses of prior jobs. This is exposed as 'jobStatus' in Job Pre-Condition scripts.

As a note, every script must return either true or false.

Examples:

To always run a job: 

    true
To never run a job: 
    false
To check if the immediate parent jobs had a status of success: 
    jobStatus.parentsIn(SUCCESS)
To check if the immediate parent job had a status of success, success with a warning, or not needed: 
    jobStatus.parentsIn(SUCCESS, SUCCESS_WARN, NOT_NEEDED)
To check if all ancestor jobs had a status of success: 
    jobStatus.allAncestorsIn(SUCCESS)
To check if any ancestor jobs had a status of success or not needed: 
    jobStatus.anyAncestorIn(SUCCESS, NOT_NEEDED)
To check if all jobs have a status of failed: 
    jobStatus.allIn(FAILED)
To check if any job has a status of failed: 
    jobStatus.anyIn(FAILED)
To check if all completed jobs had a status of success: 
    jobStatus.allCompletedIn(SUCCESS)
To check if all iterated jobs had a status of success or not needed: 
    jobStatus.allIteratedIn(SUCCESS, NOT_NEEDED)
To check if any iterated jobs had a status of failed: 
    jobStatus.anyIteratedIn(FAILED)

Method Detail

parentsIn

public boolean parentsIn(java.lang.String... statuses)
Check if all of the immediate parent jobs have a status that matches one of the specified statuses or if there are no immediate parent jobs.

Parameters:
statuses - The possible statuses of the immediate parent jobs
Returns:
True if the immediate parent jobs have one of the statuses passed in. False otherwise.

anyParentIn

public boolean anyParentIn(java.lang.String... statuses)
Check if all of the immediate parent jobs have the specified status or if there are no immediate parent jobs.

Parameters:
statuses - The statuses that at least one immediate parent job must have
Returns:
True if any of the immediate parent jobs have one of the statuses passed in. False otherwise.

allAncestorsIn

public boolean allAncestorsIn(java.lang.String... statuses)
Check if all of the ancestor jobs have a status that matches one of the specified statuses or there are no ancestor jobs. Ancestor jobs are jobs that were required to execute before the current job in the workflow.

Parameters:
statuses - The possible statuses of the ancestor jobs
Returns:
True if the all ancestor jobs have one of the statuses passed in. False otherwise.

anyAncestorIn

public boolean anyAncestorIn(java.lang.String... statuses)
Check if any of the ancestor jobs has a status that matches one of the specified statuses. Ancestor jobs are jobs that were required to execute before If there are no ancestors, the matching will return false.

Parameters:
statuses - The statuses that at least one ancestor job must have
Returns:
True if the any of the ancestor jobs have one of the statuses passed in. False otherwise.

allCompletedIn

public boolean allCompletedIn(java.lang.String... statuses)
Check if all of the completed jobs in the current workflow has a status that matches one of the specified statuses or if there are no completed jobs.

Parameters:
statuses - The possible statuses of the completed jobs
Returns:
True if the all of the completed jobs have one of the statuses passed in. False otherwise.

anyCompletedIn

public boolean anyCompletedIn(java.lang.String... statuses)
Check if any one of the completed jobs in the current workflow has a status that matches one of the specified statuses. If there are no completed jobs, the matching returns false.

Parameters:
statuses - The possible statuses that at least one completed job must have
Returns:
True if the any of the completed jobs have one of the statuses passed in. False otherwise.

allIn

public boolean allIn(java.lang.String... statuses)
Check if all of the jobs in the current workflow except the current job have a status that matches one of the specified statuses or if there are no other jobs.

Parameters:
statuses - The possible statuses of all jobs
Returns:
True if the all of the jobs have one of the statuses passed in. False otherwise.

anyIn

public boolean anyIn(java.lang.String... statuses)
Check if any one of the jobs in the current workflow except the current job have a status that matches one of the specified statuses. If there are no other jobs then the matching returns false.

Parameters:
statuses - The possible statuses that at least one job must have
Returns:
True if the any of the jobs have one of the statuses passed in. False otherwise.

allIteratedIn

public boolean allIteratedIn(java.lang.String... statuses)
Check if all of the completed jobs of the current job iteration in the current workflow have a status that matches one of the specified statuses or if there are no jobs.

Parameters:
statuses - The possible statuses of all the completed jobs of the current job iteration
Returns:
True if the all of the iterated jobs have one of the statuses passed in. False otherwise.

anyIteratedIn

Check if any one of the completed jobs of the current job iteration in the current workflow has a status that matches one of the specified statuses. If there are no other jobs then the matching returns false.

Parameters:

Returns:
